about_the_game:
Pipelinks is a 2D tile-based puzzle game where you'll use your problem-solving skills to connect a variety of pipelings and help them navigate challenging levels!

The game features dozens of levels, each with a unique layout that will challenge your puzzle-solving skills. Your goal is to connect the Pipelinks and get them to where they need to go!

But be careful! You'll need to think ahead and plan your moves carefully. You'll need to navigate obstacles like blocks and rockets that will test your spatial awareness.

As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter new challenges and obstacles that will keep you on your toes.

With its colorful graphics, catchy soundtrack, and addictive gameplay, Pipelinks is sure to keep you entertained for hours on end. So what are you waiting for? Connect those Pipelinks and reach the goal!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel High Definition Audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or bette
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intel High Definition Audio
